bibl.title: Diligent Carpenters in Dioskoros' Papyri and the Justinianic (?) Standard of Diligence. On P. Cairo Masp. II 67158 and 67159.
bibl.note: 1. Culpa-based liability in the late papyri. - 2. Partnerships of fine-carpenters from Antinoopolis. - 3. Partnerships in the Roman-byzantine papyri. - 4. The standard of diligence in labour-partnership and the care assumed by the Antinopolitan carpenters.

bibl.title: Culpa. Facets of Liability in Ancient Legal Theory and Practice. Proceedings of the Seminar Held in Warsaw 17-19 February 2011

bibl.seg: Jakub Urbanik, Diligent Carpenters in Dioskoros' Papyri and the Justinianic (?) Standard of Diligence. On P. Cairo Masp. II 67158 and 67159.

Jakub Urbanik (ed.), Culpa. Facets of Liability in Ancient Legal Theory and Practice. Proceedings of the Seminar Held in Warsaw 17-19 February 2011 = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XIX (Warsaw, 2012) pp. 273-296.

1. Culpa-based liability in the late papyri. - 2. Partnerships of fine-carpenters from Antinoopolis. - 3. Partnerships in the Roman-byzantine papyri. - 4. The standard of diligence in labour-partnership and the care assumed by the Antinopolitan carpenters.
